description:
Fans of The Walking Dead will be able to really experience what it's like to survive the zombie apocalypse very soon. On July 4th, to be exact.《行尸走肉》的粉丝们很快就可以亲身体验行尸走肉真人版了。具体来说就是7月4日。

That's the date Universal Studios Hollywood's immersive The Walking Dead attraction opens to the public, allowing fans to interact with zombies created by executive producer/director/makeup effects supervisor Greg Nicotero and his team at KNB Efx. Nicotero and Co. are using the same materials they use in the show for the attraction, including using the original mold for Bicycle Girl to create a version of that iconic walker at Universal Studios.好莱坞环球影城的《行尸走肉》模拟体验馆即将向公众开放，在这里粉丝们可以和丧尸们亲密互动，这里的丧尸是由该局的制作人兼导演兼化妆师Greg Nicotero和他的团队亲自负责。Nicotero和他的同事们在这里用的材料都和剧中道具是一样的，包括剧中很多经典僵尸角色，特别是该剧经典的单车女孩丧尸也会有。

The attraction will be open year-round. It will include a mix of costumed actors and sophisticated animatronics to bring the walkers to not-quite-life.这里将会对外公开一年左右。这里还会有很多化妆演员，他们会把剧中的丧尸带到真实世界。
